exp1.title: Tutor
exp1.description:
• Automated end-to-end tests for a Payroll Integration Platform, covering cloud-based microservices using SpecFlow, Selenium, and SQL in a .NET-based framework, significantly reducing manual regression effort across environments.
• Fixed UI defects by diagnosing React/TypeScript component issues, isolating faulty logic, and validating corrected behavior through targeted Jest tests, strengthening component stability and preventing future regressions.
• Strengthened CI/CD processes by monitoring the test suite, resolving flaky or quarantined scenarios, and validating deployments across QA environments, maintaining stable and reliable coverage with a failing rate below 5%.
• Developing a token-reuse authentication solution that allows Selenium to bypass repeated UI logins by leveraging persisted backend session data, reducing scenario runtime and significantly improving debugging efficiency.

exp2.title: Software Developer - CO-OP
exp2.description:
• Enabled centralized databases management within the same UI by devoloping a WPF desktop application using OOP and the MVVM architecture to streamline multi-database interactions and enhance user workflow efficiency.
• Implemented NUnit tests by deploying database environments in Docker-based VMs to validate added methods.
• Improved SQL query performance by creating partitioned and indexed configurations, achieving a 20% reduction in execution time as measured through custom benchmarking tests and fully documented for future optimization.

exp3.title: Software Developer - Intern
exp3.description:
• Automated real-time data manipulation workflows using Node.js, node-cron, and Axios, enabling reliable collection, validation, and storage of environmental data retrieved from external APIs.
• Designed a responsive frontend with React, HTML, and CSS, ensuring reusability and cross-platform compatibility to visualize farming data and support informed irrigation decisions.
